name: Space (Michael Anderson)
description:
S P A C E

Space is a game about connections, between you, your keys and the threads of gravity. 

This game was made in 48 hours for the 2021 GMTK Game Jam. The theme was Joined Together. Everything, all art, music, code, and systems were made by hand during the time limit.

To Play: Hold the space bar at all times to keep your planet together. As asteroids come towards you you must hold down the corresponding key(s) on your keyboard and and click in the correct sector with your mouse to destroy the asteroid (Don't let go of space!).

Walter Keiller - Programming

Michael Anderson - Programming

Ginger Mellott - Art and Animation

Chelsea Burcksen - Art and Animation 

Alex Weber - Art, Sound, and Music
